doc.field: Series 7: Event programs and related items
Series 7: Event programs and related items
Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records
Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records

Two folders containing programs, invitations, and related ephemera for special events of the LICH School of Nursing, dating from 1953 to 2007. Events include Capping exercises (1953, 1957, 1958), an Annual Fashion Show (1957), the Dramatic and Glee Clubs' presentation of "Revue of the Romantic Nineties" (1958), Junior Senior dinners (1958, 1960), Spring Home Coming celebration (1971), a Eubie Blake concert (1975), Capping and Chevron ceremony (1986), Dean Joseph K. Davie's memorial service (1994), cancer survivor events (2001, 2004), and Pinning/student recognition ceremonies (2004, 2005, 2007).
Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records
